root.name: Star Trek: The Next Generation
root.description: This pinball table was designed by Steve Ritchie and released in 1993. It is one of the most highly regarded pinball tables of all time ranks near the top of the list of the Internet Pinball Database.Thanks to a successful Kickstarter campaign, FarSight Studios will release a port of the table for their The Pinball Arcade video pinball game in 2013.
